answers.answer: When I went into labor with my son I was only having pain off and on but when I went I was dilated to a four and they kept me because I was having contractions that I couldn't feel
The hospital should keep you if you are a 5! I would go ahead and go! =)

question: Hi i am 38 weeks pregnant and just over a month ago i lost my mucus plug my ob says im 5 cm dilated iv had some cramping here and  there but nothing that stayed im a first time mom and kinda scared on if im doing the right thing i have not ruptured my membranes but im still loosing mucus discharge ob says thats normal im just wondering when should i go to hospital were i wont be sent home i havent went yet simply because my pain has come and gone and there not continuous  so my question is when would bebthe right te to admit my self in the hospital i also have pregnancy diabetes if that make a difference
title: labour
